markdown:
Re: #Music at [openmentions.com](https://openmentions.com/topics/popular-culture/music/)

"The Exile" by "Colour Of Fire" started playing in my randomized playlist. A flood of nostalgia came over me. Looking at my Last.fm profile it seems like I haven't played this song since 2010.. This song reminds me a lot of my transformative years when I was a teenager.. late nights.. open-hearted discussions with internet friends..
